description: Compute common statistics such as mean, SD, min, and max

arguments.name: columns
arguments.description: The columns to include in the summary. If not given, all columns are included.

arguments.name: organizations_to_include
arguments.description: The organizations to include in the task. If not given, all organizations in the collaboration are included.

functions.name: summary
functions.description: Run summary algorithm and obtain statistics combined for all nodes

ui_visualizations.name: Summary of numerical columns
ui_visualizations.description: Table with summary statistics of all numerical columns

ui_visualizations.name: Summary of categorical columns
ui_visualizations.description: Table with summary statistics of all categorical columns

ui_visualizations.name: Unique value counts
ui_visualizations.description: Table with counts of unique values in the categorical columns

ui_visualizations.name: Number of complete data rows
ui_visualizations.description: Table with the number of complete data rows per data station

databases.description: Data to compute the summary statistics for
databases.name: Database

name: Summary statistics
